Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2010 04:49PM spicekitty57 wrote: This is sort of on this subject and again not...Lymphedema after breast surgery is a diagnosis for long term disability. My oncologist filled out all the papers and got me on long term disability. Was wondering how i was going to work with decreased ability to use my right arm and hand...Mine is very visable. and getting worse as time progresses...i wear the sleeve and glove daily. angela colvin
Posts.Title: VISIBLE SIGNS OF LYMPHEDEMA - A PICTORIAL LindaLou53 glennie19
